algorithm.title: project_algorithm_BlockParty
algorithm.abstract: This is an algorithm for Rhino 3D. The Model can be rendered as a lamp with light sources inside.

slime.title: project_slime_mold_Schleimer
slime.abstract: The result shows the path the slime mold goes in many small lines

motor-poster.title: project_motorPoster_creepyEyes
motor-poster.abstract: The first idea that i followed in this project was to built a machine which uses a webcam and open_CV as the input sensor.  The second idea was to build something and hide the camera, somthing like a drawing. It should be somehow mystical and creepy, like a drawing with lots of eyes, and one of them allways focusing on you.
